SELECT business.id, business.business_id, business.business_name, business.price, dept.dept_name AS dept_id, business.remarks, business_type.business_type_name AS business_type FROM business LEFT JOIN dept ON dept.id = business.dept_id LEFT JOIN business_type ON business_type.id = business.business_type WHERE 1 = 1
AND business.dept_id = #{deptId}
